casebody.data:
Givens Hall & Associates, Inc., Appellant, v Marine Midland Bank, N. A., Respondent.

[— NYS2d —]

Order, Supreme Court, New York County (Walter Schackman, J.), entered on or about April 11, 1996, unanimously affirmed for the reasons stated by Schackman, J., with costs and disbursements. No opinion. Concur—Ellerin, J. P., Wallach, Williams, Tom and Andrias, JJ.
